scripts.say: ...This must be the academy's library... It's huge. This many books is something worth getting excited about.
What do you think of the library, Blanc? Do you find it to be to your liking?
Oh, hi, Z23... Yeah, I like this place. I think I'll be able to make good progress on my investigation.
That's all that matters. I take it you're interested in Mirror Seas and such?
...That too, but after reading about this world's history and the way it came into existence... I think I've started to understand the connection this world has with Gamindustri...
I see... You must be a very enlightened individual, Blanc.
...Don't compare Neptune or Vert to me. They have the intellectual capacity of a rock.
Ahaha... Well then, would you mind if I assisted you? If there happens to be any documents you skimmed past then you can tell me and I will go look for them.
Sure, I'd love some help. Thanks, Z23...!
W-wait, what is this...?!
Is something the matter, Blanc? ...Ah, that would appear to be the manga and novellas that Long Island and Ayanami bought on the internet.
Although I do believe they refer to the novellas as "light novels"...
...You'd never find genres, titles, plots, or art like this back in Gamindustri...!
...I-I want to read them! All of them! From start to finish! I want them as references for my next book...! I don't care if I'll have to pull an all-nighter...
...Um, excuse me, but... Are you feeling okay, Blanc?
Oh, hello, Z23. What are you doing here?
Good day, Miss Ranger. I should be the one asking you! What are you doing here?
Hmm? Ah, you know, I was wondering if there might be any books I could use to teach the commander about leadership, so I went here to search for some... Ah, oh no!
BA-THUMP, THUMP, THUMP!
...Hey, you dropped your books. Let's see... "Sixty Shades of Grey"?
And these are... "An Echo on the Phone"? "Seduced by a Commander"?
I-it's not what it looks like! I was just... sorting some books and I happened to have these on me!
...These are all romance stories...
...Miss Ranger?
D-don't look at me like that! ...I'm a teacher! I would never read a romance story! The thought of being together with the commander and doing stuff like this... h-has never even cross my mind!
Good day, Miss Ranger. Is there a problem?
K-Künne?!
You seem to be in possession of quite the number of books... If you don't mind, would you like me to help you carry them?
I-it's fine... I can carry them on my own... You should go look for the ones you came for...
Not at all, I would like to help! I can't simply stand aside and watch you struggle with this many books!
I'll carry these for you, will that be okay? By the way, what kind of subject are these textbooks intended for?
Umm, you see, they're not for any subject in…
The Devil Wears Nada and "Sax and the City"...? Your reference materials have some quite interesting titles!
Ahhh... Blanc, Z23, could you stop grinning at me and back me up here?!
...Sorry. I couldn't help but find this situation funny.
Somehow I feel like I've seen a side of you very different from your usual self.
Why, for being a library, it's awfully lively in here... What did I miss?
...We were just having fun teasing Ranger a little.
Blanc, please, have some mercy...
Are you here to borrow some books as well, Souryuu?
I am. I was thinking that I probably have to study a bit.

A Teacher's Tips For Making Your Students Understand Better... "10 Tricks To Improve Your Students' Grades"... "How To Make Even Idiots Pay Attention In Class"... These reference materials are all intended for teachers...
So... does that make you Miss Souryuu?
What are you saying now, Ranger? ...Sigh, at this rate I'm actually going to become established as a teacher character...
...Sure are a lot of teachers at this academy, huh?
You may be right... On that note, I too was once a teacher.
